participant_1.background:
I take my cats for walks along the beach to break the monotony of my life.
I have a secret stash of snacks in my room that my parents don't know about.
i don t like working long hours.
i like fast food too much.
I like going to Halloween parties because I can dress up and be someone else.

participant_2.background:
I check my grades before anything else.
I am working too much and not spending enough time with my family.
I am a wildlife photographer, and I wear cardigans to keep warm when I'm out in the field.
i own a chevy tahoe.
i can be quite forgetful.

content.text: Hi [username], I'm [username]!  What do you like to do for fun?
I like to take my cats for walks along the beach, go to halloween parties, and enjoy fast food. What about you?
I'm a wildlife photographer, so I enjoy spending time in the field taking pictures of animals. I also love going to the beach and checking my grades!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love the beach too.
Me too! What's your favorite kind of fast food?
I love burgers and fries!  What kind of animal do you like to photograph most?
I love photographing birds! They're so beautiful and graceful.
Birds are so cool! I love watching them fly.
I'm glad we have something in common!
Me too! I'm always happy to meet new people who love animals.
